duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop strategic sales plans and achieve fitness revenue goals
Manage and motivate the fitness team to ensure budgeted sales goals are achieved or surpassed
Maximize sales volume and personnel of all fitness related departments
Assist with recruiting, interviewing, and hiring personal fitness and Pilates trainers
Ensure staff adheres to corporate policies and procedures
Maintain the fitness center and ensure everything is stocked, clean, orderly, and in working order
Implement training, staff incentive programs, and continuing education opportunities to improve staff department

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in health/fitness-related field (Master's preferred)
Current personal training certification (ACSM, NASM, ACE, PTA Global, NFPT, CSCS or NSCA)
